page.syntax: Extracted_Files as C = Unzip_FileList(C zipfile [,C filelist [,C destination_folder [,L preserve_Paths [,L PromptOverwrite ]]]])

argument.name: Extracted_Files
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of extracted files.

argument.name: zipfile
argument.description: The path and name of the zip file.

argument.name: filelist
argument.description: Default = "" (all files). A CR-LF delimited list of files to extract from the zip file.

argument.name: destination_folder
argument.description: Default = "" (uses paths in zip file). Where to place the extracted files.

argument.name: preserve_Paths
argument.description: Default = .T.. Whether to preserve path information in the zip file under the Destination_Folder.

argument.name: PromptOverwrite
argument.description: Default = .T.. Whether to prompt the user when files are going to be overwritten.

page.description: The UNZIP_FILELIST() function extracts all or specified files from a ZIP file to a specified directory.

section.note: UNZIP_FILELIST does not support password protected zip archives.
